item.title: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising DLC character Wilnas launches August 5
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

Due out alongside version 2.20 update.

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising Character Pass Season 2 downloadable content character Wilnas will launch on August 5 for $7.99 alongside the game‚Äôs version 2.20 update, publisher Cygames and developer Arc System Works announced.

The version 2.20 update will also introduce ‚ÄúEX Characters‚Äù‚Äîremixed versions of classic skyfarers.

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Capcom Fighting Collection 2 ‚ÄòTitle Update‚Äô launches August 7
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • Switch
  • Xbox One

Including new characters for Street Fighter Alpha 3 UPPER.

Capcom will release a free title update for Capcom Fighting Collection 2 on August 7, which will feature new quality of life upgrades, brand-new artwork, remix tracks from CAP-JAMS, and additional content for certain games, the company announced.

Here is an overview of the update, via Capcom:

Prepare to take this fight to the MAX with a free title update for Capcom Fighting Collection 2 on August 7! Enjoy new quality of life upgrades, brand-new artwork, remix tracks from CAP-JAMS, and additional content for Street Fighter Alpha 3 UPPER, including Maki, Yun, Eagle, and Ingrid!

  • Capcom vs. SNK: Millennium Fight 2000 Pro
  • Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001
  • Capcom Fighting Evolution
  • Street Fighter Alpha 3 UPPER
  • Project Justice
  • Power Stone
  • Power Stone 2
  • Plasma Sword: Nightmare of Bilstein

Capcom Fighting Collection 2 is available now for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

Title Update Trailer

Japanese

item.title: Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes DLC character Izumi launches August 18 for PS5, PS4, and PC; August 20 for Switch
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

The "Initiator" of the Final Act joins the battle.

Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes downloadable content character Izumi will launch on August 18 at 6:00 p.m. PT / 9:00 p.m. ET for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC, and August 20 at 6:00 p.m. PT / 9:00 p.m. ET for Switch, publisher Arc System Works and developer French-Bread announced.

Under Night In-Birth II Sys:Celes is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail version 3.5 update ‚ÄòBefore Their Deaths‚Äô launches August 13
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Smartphone

Embark on the second half of the Amphorean story alongside Hysilens and Cerydra.

The version 3.5 update for Honkai: Star Rail, dubbed ‚ÄúBefore Their Deaths,‚Äù will launch on August 13, developer miHoYo announced.

Here is an overview of the update, via miHoYo:

This update officially kicks off the second half of the Amphoreus story. Trailblazers will encounter new companions, confront fresh enemies and events, and witness old friends in entirely new forms. Hysilens and Cerydra will also make their long-awaited debut as playable characters, joining players in the next leg of the Amphorean trailblazing expedition.

In the previous chapter, the Trailblazer made a promise to Phainon and took up the mantle of the Deliverer. In return, Phainon unleashed their blazing wrath upon Nanook, once again forcing Irontomb‚Äôs advance to a halt. Yet the journey is far from over, rescuing Amphoreus remains an unavoidable challenge. In the new Trailblaze Mission, the Trailblazer will accompany Cyrene into another cycle of Eternal Recurrence, traveling back a thousand years to the ancient Okhema. This was the age when Imperator Cerydra, the holder of the Law Coreflame, ruler of Okhema, Aglaea‚Äôs predecessor, still sat upon the throne of Okhema.

Version 3.5 introduces two powerful new characters to the team of Trailblazers. The first is Hysilens, commander of the holy city‚Äôs knights and a 5-star Physical-Type character following the Path of Nihility. Hysilens excels when paired with characters who specialize in DoT. Upon using her Ultimate, Hysilens creates a Zone. While the Zone is active, each instance of DoT inflicted on enemies will trigger an additional DoT from her. At the same time, all enemies will suffer reduced ATK and DEF. Moreover, her Basic ATK, Skill, and Ultimate each have a chance to apply a random type of DoT. Her Skill also increases the DMG enemies take, boosting the team‚Äôs overall DMG output.

The other 5-star Wind-Type character following the Path of Harmony, Imperator Cerydra, is the holder of the Law Coreflame and the initiator of the first Flame-Chase Journey. A master strategist raised on the principles of chess, she excels at long-term planning and command. In combat, her Skill grants an ally a special upgradable buff known as ‚ÄúMilitary Merit,‚Äù increasing the ally‚Äôs ATK and dealing additional DMG. As the battle progresses, Military Merit levels up. The affected ally will gain increased CRIT DMG and All-Type RES PEN when using Skills and can even replicate their Skill effects, boosting the team‚Äôs overall DMG output. Her Ultimate deals DMG to all enemies and obtains Charge for herself, providing sustained support for the team.

Additionally, the limited 5-star characters Stellaron Hunter Kafka and Silver Wolf will have their return in the first and second halves of the Version 3.5 warp event. Their formidable support makes them invaluable allies for our Trailblazers‚Äô future journeys.

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ

Version 3.5 will also introduce a brand-new map, offering Trailblazers a fresh glimpse into Styxia, the City of Infinite Revelry. The story will reach a turning point as Trailblazers face off directly against Lygus, an enemy who constantly shifts between two distinct forms. As the battle intensifies, his true identity and hidden motives may slowly be revealed.

Version 3.5 brings not only new characters and stories, but also a variety of fun-filled events for Trailblazers to enjoy. In the ‚ÄúChrysos Maze Grand Restaurant‚Äù event, Trailblazers will work alongside the Chrysos Heirs to manage a restaurant in Aedes Elysiae. As a ‚ÄúRestaurant Manager,‚Äù you‚Äôll serve delicious food to the fairies of the Membrance Maze and renovate the run-down venue by managing it wisely to win their praise and support. Meanwhile, in the ‚ÄúOld Brews & New Friends‚Äù event, Trailblazers will once again step behind the counter as a guest drinksmith at the ‚ÄúDreamjolt Hostelry,‚Äù mixing drinks and reuniting with familiar faces to share heartwarming moments.

Version 3.5 will also introduce a voice toggle feature for collaboration characters. Trailblazers will be able to switch their interaction, combat, and idle voice lines between the in-game dub and the original licensed voice actors, offering a more immersive experience. Additionally, Honkai: Star Rail will be attending this year‚Äôs gamescom. Trailblazers are invited to stop by the event booth to check in and pick up some giveaways. For more details about our presence at the show, stay tuned to our official social media channels!

Honkai: Star Rail is available now for PlayStation 5, PC via client download and Epic Games Store, iOS via App Store, and Android via Google Play.

Watch a new trailer and special program below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

The Deliverer Trailer: ‚ÄúTrailblazer‚Äù
